name: Down The Rat Hole
description:
Help Ratto navigate deeper and deeper through the dark tunnels. Avoid the dangers behind every dark turn and meet the friends that are waiting for you down below.

   Ratto's biggest challenge, though? Their self-doubt. Collect power ups and defeat your inner demon. The only way out is through!

Controls:
  • A&D - Movement left and right
  • Q - Dig in front of you
  • E - Dig beneath you
  • Space - Jump

Created by Team Event Horizon for Ludum Dare 48
